CustomField.description: Given the Milestone objects sharing settings are setup to be private or public read only, when tasks are created for a milestone read access will be provided to that milestone for the resource assigned to the new tasks.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Given the Milestone objects sharing settings are setup to be private or public read only, when tasks are created for a milestone read access will be provided to that milestone for the resource assigned to the new tasks.
CustomField.label: Automatic Task Resource Sharing
